attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: If like me, you believe this is the only democratically acceptable way to restore public trust in "OUR" parliament, please sign this petition. If you believe the issue of parliamentary accountability needs to be dealt with right now at the ballot box, please sign this petition. If you think the same institutions that allowed this mess to happen in the first place are unfit to sort it out, then please sign my petition.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
